meanings.definition: To excrete sweat through the pores of the skin.
meanings.sent1: After running, I sudate a lot.
meanings.sent2: During exercise, our bodies sudate to cool down.
meanings.sent3: The intense heat made the ice cream sudate quickly.
meanings.sent4: The plants sudated droplets of water in the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's forehead started to sudate as she pushed herself to the limit.

meanings.sent1: The wet towel sudates water onto the table.
meanings.sent2: The fresh fruit sudates juice when squeezed.
meanings.sent3: The leaky faucet sudated water all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The cold glass sudated condensation on the outside.
meanings.sent5: The flower petals sudated fragrant oils in the warm room.
